area.statedescriptor: The alarm sound is piercing but unphased you continue to empty the valuables from inside the bank's vault into a bag in front of you... As sweat collects underneath the balaclava your mum knitted you the realisation sinks in that you are a loser and you live with your mum. Robbing the bank may impress a lot of people... but for fucks sake, find your way out now or you'll be living in prison! Don't forget to get your gun and bag... Exit to the north.
area.areacommand: You exit the banks vault into their not so secure store room.

item.statedescriptor: Its ok, no one else knows its just a BB gun.
Your trusty old sidearm is on the bench beside you just waiting to be wielded.
item.itemcommand: Sweet, theres heaps of BBs left and the hop up will own that security guard. Link
You toss the gun aside like yesterdays jam. Bad move.

item.statedescriptor: A reasonably priced hemp bag you bought from army surplus for your incence collection. Although second hand it has very little signs of wear. All in all a fair purchase.
item.itemcommand: The bag is really heavy. You did good buddy.
Money isn't everything, theres plenty more banks in the city and with a keen pal like Robert you're bound to get the Street Cred that you crave.

area.statedescriptor: This room used to be secure but on your way in (from the north) you used RAGE and axed down the door. Thats funny, the axe isn't here anymore. You become suspicious... There is a exit to the west
area.areacommand: Preceding with caution you make your way to the front of the bank.
You go back into the vault.

area.statedescriptor: People are huddled face down. There are fewer customers than you had planned for but then again it is a Westpac bank. Your partner in crime is watching over keeping control of the situation. "Lets go Terrance!", he yells from his wheelchair, pistol waving madly. Robert certainly is one crazy SOB. There is a exit to the north
area.areacommand: You go back to the store room.
You open the door for Robert and follow him out to the getaway van.

item.statedescriptor: Its a pen on a string. You know, the ones so that you can't take because there's a physical link from the pen to a fixed surface so bankers don't steal it. What a great invention.
a pen just lying on the ground and stuff
item.itemcommand: "Snap!" The chain broke and the pen is yours. +25 Street Cred Points
Old butterfingers McGee here... One chance to get one of these puppies and you screwed it up. -40 Street Cred Points.

area.statedescriptor: Fresh air slaps you in the face and you inhale the sweet smell of freedom and money, oh and the stacks of Street Cred you're gaining. It smells good! You can go east
area.areacommand: You go back to the lobby.

The van is ready and waiting with wheelchair ramp down. Seconds seem like hours as the ramp pulls Robert up inside the van. The jobs not done yet, you lock the wheels on Roberts wheelchair and make sure he is secure. Safety is paramount.

item.statedescriptor: Slight problem though - the security guard is coming at you with *SURPRISE* an axe. Wow a weapon would come in handy about now. Or try your feet.
The security guard is rolling around the ground crying, holding his eye. You feel bad, but you're a hardening street criminal, you'll get over it.
item.itemcommand: Congratulations! You hit his left eye and he crumples to the ground. Surely an eye patch and a life of unsteady employment is in order for this guy. Bravo! +40 Street Cred.

You run at the guard to kick him, he swings your own axe at you. The axe and your foot meet and your foot comes out worse off. You are crying in a ball on the ground and the guard has no mercy. He lifts the axe above his head and brings it down on your ass. You die.

item.statedescriptor: There is a full holy grail.
item.itemcommand: You pick up the holy grail.

area.statedescriptor: With Robert safely inside the van you step on it. Tyres screech and the bitumen and rubber flies. You're so hardcore. YOU WIN! You have gained +1000 Street Cred. Because you win Robert massages your shoulders from the back of the van. What a guy! GAME_OVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!

You may be curious or you may be stupid. In this case you were stupid. Behind the mirrored glass door be dragons. YOU DIED. +100 Street Creds for bravery -100 Street Creds for stupidity. GAME_OVER!!!!!!!!!!!!
